name: Daishimaru Life (Fairytale V. 1.5)
description: Pale, blue theme for Tumblr, based off of Dangan Fairytale. Includes highlighting fix.

user.name: Leo Calad
user.about: Hi, I'm Leo! I'm an 18 y/o demiboy. I use he/they pronouns, but would like to request being referred to by they pronouns unless if say I you can use otherwise.
